id.description: The OpenAIRE id of the entity

type.description: The type of the entity (i.e. organisation)

provenance.description: The reason why OpenAIRE holds the relation

trust.description: The trust of the relation in the range of [0,1]. Where greater the number, more the trust. Harvested relationships have typically a high trust (0.9). The trust of inferred relationship is calculated by the inference algorithm that generated them, as described in https://graph.openaire.eu/about#architecture (Enrichment --> Mining)

name.description: The semantics of the relation (i.e. isAuthorInstitutionOf).

type.description: the type of the relation (i.e. affiliation)

reltype.description: To represent the semantics of a relation between two entities

allOf.description: The node source in the relation
The node target in the relation

validated.description: True if the relation is related to a project and it has been collected from an authoritative source (i.e. the funder)

validationDate.description: The date when the relation was collected from OpenAIRE
